I want this as well.
But in the mean time, I just use hubl to resize the picture to what I need with `resize_image_url`  and hide the image size control. So it doesn't matter what size of the uploaded image.

Of course, it would be great if we can control it in the upload step.
It would be easier to help if you provide the code or the link to the website.

Create a style fields.
And then in the module.html use `{% require_css %}`  and `{% scope_css %}`

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files#require-css-block>
